attributes.action: Ban Sinn Fein Ministers from claiming expenses whilst refusing to take their seats in Parliament.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is wrong that Politicians who refuse to take their place in Parliament can claim expenses.  They do a disservice to their constituents and should not be subsidised to do so.

A political party that spent three decades endorsing the actions of the IRA, including attempts on our own Prime Minister's life, does not deserve public money.

Please join me in condemning this practice.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament: http://www.parliament.uk/
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
